column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Daun Penh police rounded up prostitutes who solicit on the streets and under the trees around the historic site of Wat Phnom.------Following the stringent orders of Mr. Sok Penh Vuth
column6: in cooperation with forces of the Wat Phnom commune Unity Command
column8: citing street safety and degradation of Cambodian women.------A total of 49  prostitutes
column9: 37 women and 12 men/ladyboys were sent for education. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/462337
